# ports

**Instance Property**

The ports available on a capture input.

## Declaration

```swift
var ports: [AVCaptureInput.Port] { get }
```

## Discussion

Individual ports post an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureInput/Port/formatDescriptionDidChangeNotification] notification when their [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureInput/Port/formatDescription] changes.

## Accessing ports

- **AVCaptureInput.Port**: An object that represents a stream of data that a capture input provides.
